description.value: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Messenger], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm Emotions] (animals only), and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Animals] as 2nd-level primal innate spells once per day each. These spells use your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
